title: Calories in a Small Baked Potato
meta_description: Discover calories in small baked potato, including carbs, fiber, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with easy tweaks.
h1: Calories in a Small Baked Potato
assumptions: Plain russet potato, baked with skin, no added butter/oil/salt, approximately 150g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by potato variety, size, baking method, and any additions; values are averagesâ€”check sources for precision.

quick_answer.text: A small baked potato provides about 140 kcal, mainly from complex carbs.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts for straightforward comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a small baked potato?
faqs.a: Approximately 140 kcal for a plain 150g baked potato with skin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a small baked potato?
faqs.a: About 32g total carbs, including 3.4g fiber and 1.8g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a small baked potato low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.2g fat total, with no saturated or trans fats.

faqs.q: How much protein in a small baked potato?
faqs.a: Roughly 3.7g protein per small baked potato.
Baking retains most nutrients; calories are similar to boiled but depend on moisture loss.
